text: The 2014–15 Croatian Premier Handball League is the 24th season of the Premier League, Croatia's premier Handball league. == Team information == The following 16 clubs compete in the Premijer liga during the 2014–15 season: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" !
